hero.title: Generate
hero.description: Simple, fast, and customizable. Just enter your URL to generate high-quality QR codes. Perfect for marketing campaigns, business cards, or any sharing scenario.

features.title: Core Features
features.subtitle: Why Choose QR Master?
features.description: More than just generation, we provide superior and professional QR code solutions.

customizable.title: Highly Customizable
customizable.desc: Customize colors, margins, and sizes to perfectly integrate QR codes into your brand design and enhance brand image.

highQuality.title: HD Export
highQuality.desc: Support HD PNG format downloads, pixel-perfect, meeting various needs from web display to large-format printing.

compatible.title: Cross-Platform Compatible
compatible.desc: Generated QR codes are optimized for quick and accurate recognition on all mainstream smartphones and scanning apps.

permanent.title: Permanent
permanent.desc: Generated static QR codes don't depend on our servers. As long as your link is valid, the QR code remains valid forever.

noRegistration.title: No Registration
noRegistration.desc: Say goodbye to tedious registration processes. Use it immediately upon opening the page, protecting your privacy and improving efficiency.

realtime.title: Real-time Preview
realtime.desc: What you see is what you get. QR codes update in real-time as you adjust settings, ensuring satisfactory results.

items.name: John Smith
items.content: This is the simplest and fastest QR code generator I've ever used. The custom color feature makes our marketing materials look more professional.

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.content: As a designer, I'm very detail-oriented. The HD PNG generated by this tool perfectly meets my printing needs. Highly recommended!

items.name: Mike Chen
items.content: No login required, free to use, and the generated QR codes scan quickly. Perfect for small businesses like ours.

items.question: Are the generated QR codes permanent?
items.answer: Yes, as long as your entered URL is valid, the generated QR code will remain valid. We don't set any expiration time for QR codes.

items.question: Can I use the generated QR codes for commercial purposes?
items.answer: Absolutely. QR codes generated by this tool are completely free. You can use them for any personal or commercial projects without attribution.

items.question: Do you store my data?
items.answer: No. We take your privacy very seriously. Your entered URL is only used for real-time QR code generation. We don't store any information on our servers.

items.question: How can I improve QR code scanning success rate?
items.answer: We recommend maintaining sufficient contrast between foreground and background colors (e.g., black and white). Also, avoid making QR codes too small or too complex.

footer.description: Providing simple, fast, and professional QR code generation services. No login required, use immediately.

editor.title: QR Code Style Editor
editor.styleDescription: 0-17 characters, printable within 20mm diameter, recommended scanning from 1m away
editor.dotStyleDesc: Select the shape style of dots
editor.cornerStyleDesc: Select the shape of corner squares
editor.styleLibraryDesc: Select preset styles for quick application
editor.tip1: Maintain sufficient contrast between foreground and background colors
editor.tip2: Logo should preferably use PNG format with transparent background
editor.tip3: Higher error correction means more complex QR codes but better fault tolerance

animatedQR.title: Animated QR Code
animatedQR.subtitle: Add dynamic visual effects to your QR codes
animatedQR.description: Support gradient animations, shape transformations, and breathing effects to make your QR codes more attractive

shapeTransform.title: Shape Transform Animation
shapeTransform.description: Achieve shape changes of QR code elements

breathing.title: Breathing Effect
breathing.description: Add breathing animation with scaling or opacity changes

tips.title: Usage Tips
tips.scanability: Ensure animations don't affect QR code scanability
tips.performance: Use simpler animation effects on mobile devices
tips.fileSize: Choose appropriate quality settings to balance file size and effects
tips.colorContrast: Maintain sufficient color contrast to ensure scanability
tips.animationSpeed: Slower animation speeds usually work better

totp.title: TOTP Authenticator
totp.subtitle: Generate TOTP two-factor authentication QR codes
totp.description: Create Google Authenticator compatible dynamic codes that update every 30 seconds
totp.scanInstructions: Scan this QR code with Google Authenticator or other TOTP apps
totp.mvpNote: TOTP feature development is nearly complete. Currently in final testing and optimization phase!
totp.readyToGenerate: Ready to Generate TOTP QR Code
totp.fillFormPrompt: Please fill in service name and account name, then click generate button

encrypted.title: Encrypted QR Code
encrypted.subtitle: Secure your sensitive data with military-grade encryption
encrypted.description: Hide sensitive information in ordinary-looking QR codes with AES-256 encryption and anti-brute-force protection
encrypted.designPhase: Core functionality completed, UI implementation in progress. Expected release: Q2 2025

features.title: Security Features
features.disguiseProtection: Disguise layer shows harmless content to unauthorized users
features.integrityVerification: Automatic tamper detection and data integrity verification
features.customization: Full style customization with logo embedding support
features.crossPlatform: Compatible with all mainstream QR code scanners

useCases.title: Use Cases
useCases.personal: Personal passwords, private keys, identity information
useCases.business: Employee credentials, customer data, API keys

security.title: Security Highlights
security.localProcessing: All encryption performed locally - no data uploaded
security.memoryProtection: Secure memory cleanup prevents data leakage

roadmap.q4: Q4 2025: Batch processing and advanced features

metadata.title: QR Master - Free Online QR Code Generator
metadata.description: Simple, fast, and customizable online QR code generator. Supports custom colors, logos, dot styles, and more. Completely free, no registration required.
metadata.keywords: QR code generator,QR Code,QR code customization,free QR code
